Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Southbound Reroute near Stony Island/75th
ShortDescription: Southbound 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 75th, Jeffrey, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 75th, Jeffrey, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near Stony Island/75th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
